Population affected by water related disease

Area: [1] [P-Observations-N] | No municipal treatment plants exist. Treatment systems are mostly onsite, example the national hospital has treatment facilities ( but out of order since 2013). The treated effluent was discharged in the Niger river - details on type and efficiency of treatments system not clear.
[2] [P-Components-N] | Malaria : 80.5 cases for 1000 habitants; urinary bilharzia: 4693 cases in 2010
